Feature Notes:
Monastic Tradition: 1 selection
Keen Mind: Always knows the direction of north and hours until sunrise or sunset/Can recall anything seen or heard during the past month
Ki: Can use 20 Ki Points per short rest
Observant: Can read lips
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of NH-Rillifane Rallathil and fellow believers
Timeless Body (Monk): Suffers no debility from aging and needs no food or water
Tongue Of The Sun And Moon: Can communicate in any language
Wholeness Of Body: Can use an action to regain 60 hit points once per long rest

Combat
Hit Points: 121 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 14 Attacks Per Round: 2
Weapon Proficiency: Shortsword; Simple Weapons
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Club (+8 1d4+2); Greatclub (+6 1d8); Unarmed (+8 1d10+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Martial Arts: When unarmored, gains +2 attack and damage with monk weapons and raises damage die to 1d10
Unarmored Defense (Monk): +2 Armor Class in no armor
Deflect Missiles: Can use a reaction to reduce missile damage by 1d10+22 HP; reducing it to 0 hit points allows spending 1 Ki Point to make an immediate attack
Flurry Of Blows: Can spend 1 Ki Point to make 2 unarmed strikes as a bonus action
Ki-Empowered Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magical
Martial Arts: When unarmored, can use a bonus action to make an unarmed strike after a monk weapon attack
Mobile: Can Dash at full speed in difficult terrain/Attacking a target does not provoke an opportunity attack
Mounted Combatant: Has advantage on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount and can redirect attacks on mount to self
Open Hand Technique: Can use Flurry of Blows to inflict a choice of knocked prone (DC 16 Dexterity negates), a 15' push (DC 16 Strength negates), or loss of reactions for 1 rd
Opportunist: Can use a reaction to attack an adjacent foe damaged by another creature
Patient Defense: Can spend 1 Ki Point to Dodge as a bonus action
Perfect Self: Has a minimum of 4 Ki Points available after initiative
Quivering Palm: Can spend 3 Ki Points after a successful unarmed attack to reduce a foe to 0 hit points at any time within 20 days (DC 16 Constitution inflicts 10d10 HP necrotic)
Step Of The Wind: Can spend 1 Ki Point to double jump distance and to Disengage or Dash as a bonus action
Stunning Strike: Can spend 1 Ki Point after a successful attack to stun the target (DC 16 Constitution negates) for 1 rd
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Constitution; Dexterity; Intelligence; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 6; Constitution: 8; Dexterity: 8; Intelligence: 9; Strength: 6; Wisdom: 8
Save Notes:
Diamond Soul: Proficient on all saves
Resilient: Save Proficiency (Choose 1 from any)
Diamond Soul: Can spend 1 Ki Point to reroll a save
Evasion: Successful Dexterity saves yield no damage instead of half, and failures yield half damage
Mounted Combatant: Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Purity Of Body: Has immunity to disease and poison
Stillness Of Mind: Can use an action to end charm or fright affecting self
Magic
Attack: Monk: 8 Spell DC: Monk: 16
Spells:
Astral Projection (Monk9 [Empty Body] Necr): R10' Self and 8 willing targets project to astral plane
Burning Hands (Monk1 [Sweeping Cinder Strike] Evoc): 15' cone inflicts 3d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Cone Of Cold (Monk5 [Breath Of Winter] Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Darkness (Monk2 [Shadow Arts] Evoc): R60' Target centers a 15' radius lightless area for concentration up to 10 min
Darkvision (Monk2 [Shadow Arts] Tran): Willing touched sees 60' in darkness for 8 hr
Fireball (Monk3 [Flames Of The Phoenix] Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Fly (Monk3 [Ride The Wind] Tran): Touched gains a 60' fly speed for concentration up to 10 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Gaseous Form (Monk3 [Mist Stance] Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous, gaining a 10' fly Speed and advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saves, for concentration up to 1 hr
Gust Of Wind (Monk2 [Rush Of The Gale Spirits] Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (save Strength negates), inflicts half movement, and has a 50% chance of extinguishing flames for concentration up to 1 min
Hold Person (Monk2 [Clench Of The North Wind] Ench): R60' Immobilizes the target humanoid (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Minor Illusion (Monk0 [Shadow Arts] Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Pass Without Trace (Monk2 [Shadow Arts] Abju): Targets in a 30' radius gain +10 Stealth and become trackable only by magic for concentration up to 1 hr
Sanctuary (Monk1 [Tranquility] Abju): R30' Foes of the target cannot attack it (save Wisdom negates) for 1 min; target attacking ends
Shatter (Monk2 [Gong Of The Summit] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (save Constitution half; inorganic creatures have disadvantage) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Silence (Monk2 [Shadow Arts] Illu): R120' 20' radius blocks sound for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Stoneskin (Monk4 [Eternal Mountain Defense] Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Thunderwave (Monk1 [Fist Of Four Thunders] Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (save Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Fire (Monk4 [River Of Hungry Flame] Evoc): R120' Creates a 60'x20'x1' wall or a 20'x20'x1' ring that inflicts 5d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) within 10' of a chosen side for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Stone (Monk5 [Wave Of Rolling Earth] Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10'x6" or 10'x20'x3" panels for concentration up to 10 min
Magic Notes:
Disciple Of The Elements: Can select 4 elemental disciplines
Breath Of Winter: Can spend 6 Ki Points to cast Cone Of Cold
Clench Of The North Wind: Can spend 3 Ki Points to cast Hold Person
Cloak Of Shadows (Way Of Shadow): Can use an action to become invisible in dim and dark areas; attacking or casting ends
Elemental Attunement: R30' Can create a harmless instantaneous elemental effect, light or snuff a small flame, chill or warm a 1 lb object for 1 hr, or shape a 1' cube of earth, fire, water, or mist for 1 min
Empty Body: Can spend 4 Ki Points to become invisible and gain resistance to all damage other than force for 1 min/Can spend 8 Ki Points to cast Astral Projection on self
Eternal Mountain Defense: Can spend 5 Ki Points to cast Stoneskin on self
Fangs Of The Fire Snake: Can spend 1 Ki Point to make a +10' unarmed attack, inflicting fire damage, and 1 additional Ki Point to inflict +1d10 HP fire
Fist Of Four Thunders: Can spend 2 Ki Points to cast Thunderwave
Fist Of Unbroken Air: R30' Can spend 2+ Ki Points to inflict 3d10+ HP, push 20', and knock prone (DC 16 Strength half HP only)
Flames Of The Phoenix: Can spend 4 Ki Points to cast Fireball
Gong Of The Summit: Can spend 3 Ki Points to cast Shatter
Mist Stance: Can spend 4 Ki Points to cast Gaseous Form on self
Ride The Wind: Can spend 4 Ki Points to cast Fly on self
River Of Hungry Flame: Can spend 5 Ki Points to cast Wall Of Fire
Rush Of The Gale Spirits: Can spend 2 Ki Points to cast Gust Of Wind
Shadow Arts: Knows the Minor Illusion cantrip and can spend 2 Ki Points to cast Darkness, Darkvision, Pass Without Trace, or Silence
Shadow Step: Can use a bonus action to teleport 60' between dim or dark areas and gain advantage on the first melee attack during that turn
Shape The Flowing River: R120' Can spend 1 Ki Point to freeze, thaw, and shape a 30' cube of water
Sweeping Cinder Strike: Can spend 2 Ki Points to cast Burning Hands
Tranquility: Can gain Sanctuary effects between long rests (DC 16 Wisdom negates)
Water Whip: R30' Can spend 2+ Ki Points to inflict 3d10+ HP bludgeoning and pull 25' or knock prone (DC 16 Strength half HP only)
Wave Of Rolling Earth: Can spend 6 Ki Points to cast Wall Of Stone
